com.bertramlabs.plugins.karman
[Groovy] Interface DirectoryInterface

interface DirectoryInterface

An Interface for interacting with Cloud Containers (i.e. Buckets). If looking to add new cloud providers, one must implement this interface via the Directory abstract class.

Authors:
David Estes
